trans-unit.target: TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_SEQ_00<tab>Guildmaster Luciane is having a heated discussion with Silvairre. Perhaps you should intervene.

TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_SEQ_01<tab>Silvairre reveals that he has discovered the whereabouts of Pawah Mujuuk, before rushing off alone to apprehend her. Follow him to the South Shroud and see that he comes to no harm.

TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_SEQ_02<tab>You find Silvairre surrounded by the bodies of an unknown gang of poachers, exhausted but unharmed. After you dispatch a pursuing party of assailants, the Elezen explains his plan to lure Pawah out of hiding. Make your way to the specified clearing and use the bone whistle Silvairre has given you to summon Pawah and her gang.

TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_SEQ_03<tab>After a fierce battle, the three of you successfully subdue Pawah and consign her infamous gang to history. Return to the Archers' Guild and share the tale of your triumph with Luciane.

TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_SEQ_04<tab>Luciane is glad of your safe return, and proud to have such a dedicated and compassionate adventurer in her ranks. By way of thanks for your continued contribution to the guild, she teaches you a new technique: Windbite. Though the road to mastery is long and easily lost, Luciane is confident that you will find your way.
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_TODO_00<tab>Find Silvairre.
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_TODO_01<tab>Summon Pawah Mujuuk's gang.
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_TODO_02<tab>Report to Luciane.
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_LEIHALIAPOH_000_1<tab>Thank the gods you've come, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Perhaps you can talk some sense into this stubborn fool!
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_LUCIANE_000_2<tab>Calm yourself, Silvairre. At least let us petition the Order of the Twin Adder for─
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_SILVAIRRE_000_3<tab>There is no <var 1A 02 /var>time<var 1A 01 /var>, Luciane! Pawah would be long gone before their forces had even assembled!
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_SILVAIRRE_000_4<tab>Alone, I can move more swiftly, take these poachers by surprise, and force them to divulge her location.
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_LEIHALIAPOH_000_5<tab>We understand how you feel, Silvairre, but this is too reckless! At least permit <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and me to accompany you.
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_SILVAIRRE_000_6<tab><var 1A 02 /var>You<var 1A 01 /var>? The adventurer and the savage? You do not─you <var 1A 02 /var>cannot<var 1A 01 /var> understand.
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_LUCIANE_000_7<tab>Silvairre!

TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_LEIHALIAPOH_000_8<tab>But I <var 1A 02 /var>do<var 1A 01 /var> understand! I know what it means to take pride in your home, to want more than anything to protect it...and to be consumed by guilt when you cannot. I <var 1A 02 /var>see<var 1A 01 /var> what you're going through, Silvairre, and I...I understand.

TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_LEIHALIAPOH_000_9<tab>This guild taught me to open my eyes and see clearly. I beg you, Silvairre, open yours! You have friends here, ready to fight. You have <var 1A 02 /var>us<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_SILVAIRRE_000_10<tab>...I have never considered you my friends. Do <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> follow me.
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_LEIHALIAPOH_000_11<tab>...Well his lying certainly hasn't improved. <sigh>

TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_LEIHALIAPOH_000_12<tab>If he honestly thinks he's doing us a favor by forbidding us from getting involved, he's an even bigger fool than I imagined. Come, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! To the South Shroud!
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_SILVAIRRE_000_21<tab><pant> <pant> Well this is...unfortunate.
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_LEIHALIAPOH_000_22<tab>Silvairre!
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_SILVAIRRE_000_23<tab>Leih!? <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!? I told you not to follow me! I neither need nor want─
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_LEIHALIAPOH_000_24<tab>Don't take me for a fool. You cannot conceal the truth from <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var> archer's eye!
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_LEIHALIAPOH_000_25<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, the others are almost upon us. We must make our stand here and protect Silvairre!
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_SILVAIRRE_000_30<tab>...I told you, I do not need or want your assistance. Quite why you have deluded yourselves into thinking─
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_LEIHALIAPOH_000_31<tab>You're the one who's deluded! Thinking you could deceive us, when even a blind man could see that you cover your mouth every time you tell a lie.
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_SILVAIRRE_000_32<tab>...
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_LEIHALIAPOH_000_33<tab>Observe with intent, overlooking not the smallest detail. Discern your subject's unique characteristics, and recognize patterns in their behavior.
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_LEIHALIAPOH_000_34<tab>I learned these things from Luciane...and from you.

TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_LEIHALIAPOH_000_35<tab>And I'll be damned if I'm going to watch you get yourself killed! There's still so much I don't know about Gridania and Wildwood archery, so much that I...that I need you to teach me!
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_SILVAIRRE_000_36<tab>...Hmph. I suppose fixing your form is the least I can do.
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_LEIHALIAPOH_000_37<tab>Why, you─
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_SILVAIRRE_000_38<tab>Pawah's gang is already on the move. We have but one chance to catch them.

TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_SILVAIRRE_000_39<tab>Poachers throughout the Twelveswood use bone whistles like this one to communicate. With it, I believe we can lure Pawah out of hiding─assuming she has not moved on.
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_LEIHALIAPOH_000_40<tab>So that's why you came to Takers' Rot...for this gang's whistle.
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_SILVAIRRE_000_41<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─if you are determined to help me, I have a task for you.

TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_SILVAIRRE_000_42<tab>Pawah was last seen near Issom-Har. To the east of the camp, through a hollow tree trunk, is a clearing where two streams meet, and efts are wont to congregate. We will lay our trap there, and you will be the bait.
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_SILVAIRRE_000_43<tab>Do not fear, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I swear on my honor as a Gridanian archer that no harm will come to you.
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_PAWAHMUJUUK_000_0000<tab>Bollocks. I <var 1A 02 /var>knew<var 1A 01 /var> I should've trusted me gut.
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_PAWAHMUJUUK_000_0001<tab>...Some blokes just can't take a hint.
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_SILVAIRRE_000_0002<tab>I <var 1A 02 /var>do<var 1A 01 /var> hope you will forgive my forwardness, madam.
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_PAWAHMUJUUK_000_0003<tab>No, no, sir...'tis most <var 1A 02 /var>flatterin'<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_PAWAHMUJUUK_000_0004<tab>Wouldn't ye agree, sisters!? Why don't we show our gallant Wildwood admirer an' his mates just how much we appreciate their attentions!?
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_PAWAHMUJUUK_000_0005<tab>I hope ye like it rough, darlin'!
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_SILVAIRRE_000_1001<tab>And I thought you only had eyes for me...
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_PAWAHMUJUUK_000_1001<tab>...I can't...I won't...
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_SILVAIRRE_000_70<tab>Hmph. Did you learn nothing from my lesson? Your style is far removed from proper Wildwood technique. Still...you acquitted yourself well enough, I suppose.
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_SILVAIRRE_000_71<tab>I will see to Pawah. Should she try to escape, she will find me far less sympathetic than the last time.
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_LEIHALIAPOH_000_75<tab>Did you see it, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? A perfect shot!
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_LEIHALIAPOH_000_76<tab>Luciane must hear of this! Let's hurry back to Gridania at once!
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_PAWAHMUJUUK_000_80<tab><groan>
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_LUCIANE_000_60<tab>I am relieved to see you again, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_LUCIANE_000_61<tab>Had the three of you not been united in your purpose, Pawah Mujuuk would still be free, and one or more of you would surely be dead.

TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_LUCIANE_000_62<tab>I am so proud of you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Not only have you mastered our teachings, but you have also helped your guildmates regain the perspective that they had lost. For showing such compassion to your peers, I wish to teach you a new technique─Windbite.

TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_LUCIANE_000_63<tab>With Windbite, you can bring the power of the very air around you to bear against your opponents. And they will suffer on long after you have nocked your next arrow. It will serve you well in battle, I am certain.

TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_LUCIANE_000_64<tab>All archers walk the same path, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, towards improvement and discovery. As long as you have the vision to see the path ahead, you will continue to mature and excel.
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_LUCIANE_000_65<tab>Yet we all grow weary and lose direction in time. When this befalls you, I have no doubt but that you will find your way back to us.
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_LUCIANE_000_66<tab>Trust in your eyes, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. They will never lead you astray.
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_QIB_TODO_001<tab>Defeat the poachers!
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_QIB_TODO_002<tab>Defeat Pawah Mujuuk the Ghost!
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_INSTANCE_BATTLE_YESNO_TITLE<tab>Duty calls. Do you wish to proceed with “The One That Got Away”?
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_INSTANCE_BATTLE_YESNO_YES<tab>Yes
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_INSTANCE_BATTLE_YESNO_NO<tab>No
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_INSTANCE_BATTLE_YESNO_TITLE_2<tab>Duty calls. Do you wish to proceed with “The One That Got Away”?
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_INSTANCE_BATTLE_YESNO_YES_2<tab>Yes
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_INSTANCE_BATTLE_YESNO_NO_2<tab>No
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_UNNOWN_BATTLETALK_01<tab>Brought friends, did ye!? Then ye won't have to die alone!
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_LEIHALIAPOH_BATTLETALK_01<tab>If you want him, come and claim him!
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_UNNOWN_BATTLETALK_02<tab>Careful, these ones are feisty!
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_UNNOWN_BATTLETALK_03<tab>Gridanian bastards! How dare you attack our people!
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_LEIHALIAPOH_BATTLETALK_DEAD<tab>Ugh... Protect Silvairre... I'll be fine...
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_SILVAIRRE_BATTLETALK_01<tab>Leih, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─deal with the others. Pawah and I have unfinished business.
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_LEIHALIAPOH_BATTLETALK_02<tab>Heh, <var 1A 02 /var>as you will<var 1A 01 /var>!
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_PAWAHMUJUUK_BATTLETALK_03<tab>If ye wanted to dance, all ye had to do was ask!
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_PAWAHMUJUUK_BATTLETALK_04<tab>My sisters ain't to yer likin'? Too bloody picky, that's yer trouble!
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_LEIHALIAPOH_BATTLETALK_05<tab>Ugh, my arms...what did you do to me!?
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_PAWAHMUJUUK_BATTLETALK_06<tab>Bet yer guildmaster never taught ye that one!
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_PAWAHMUJUUK_BATTLETALK_07<tab>Is it just me, or is it gettin' a bit chilly out?
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_PAWAHMUJUUK_BATTLETALK_08<tab>Don't worry, folks─I'll keep ye warm an' toasty!
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_SILVAIRRE_BATTLETALK_09<tab>Leih, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─spread out! She has oiled arrows!
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_LEIHALIAPOH_BATTLETALK_DEAD_02<tab>Not to you...anyone but you...
TEXT_CLSARC006_00076_SILVAIRRE_BATTLETALK_DEAD_02<tab>Ugh...so it's to be like that, huh...
